actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for flood control, St. Johns Bayou and New Madrid Floodway, Missouri.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the Saint Johns Bayou and New Madrid Floodway project, Missouri, in accordance with the Report of the Chief of Engineers (January 4, 1983), with specified exceptions (relating to the acquisition of lands for mitigation of damage to fish and wildlife).

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for flood control, St. Johns Bayou and New Madrid Floodway, Missouri.
